Human-kun runs to the room and hugs Mimiko with tears in his eyes "I'm sorry, I'm sorry for I almost let you get eaten by the dragon." Sigurd puts gram to Human-kun's hand "Give this to your boss, it should be enough as pay off for the dragon" He disappears right after saying that. Human-kun told boss about what happened and gave him the sword. He married Mimiko and she became the first cow-girl president, she made a law that no more cow-girls were eaten by dragons and happily lived with human-kun until the end of their lives. The end

"Using special move."sword hits and pierces dragon's belly and he feels immerse pain for it is no ordinary sword, but gram, demonic sword forged from the dragon-slaying holy sword balmung and the sun itself " O Demonic Sword of the Sun, with that blade, give rise to destruction!" Sigurd slams his full fist into gram's hilt
"Bölverk Gram!" Beam shoots out of the sword and dragon gets scattered to thousands of pieces of blood and gore. Sigurd picks up his sword and cuts off Mimiko's handcuffs.

"Yes, but I don't think it matters anymore" says human-kun with a sad voice "She's going to get eaten by the dragon". Sigurd looks at human-kun " Do you want me to slay that dragon? I have some experience with that". Human-kun looks at Mimiko's face filled with terror "Yes, do it and save Mimiko". Sigurd nods and runs out of the room, human-kun looks at the door for a few seconda and then looks back on the screen, the dragon is about to bite off Mimiko's boob, when a blue dagger hits his face. Dragon's face is filled with anger as he looks at Sigurd "How dare you throw daggers at me, human?". "I am Sigurd, I took the life of the great dragon Fafnir and now, I'm going to take yours." Dragon laugh "Try and kill me if you can, but you humans can nothing, but talk. He stops laughing the moment Sigurd's dagger pierces his eye. " That hurts, but it's far from being enough to kill me" He shoots fire from his mouth right at Sigurd. Sigurd dodges the fire and throws his sword at the dragon.

Alternate ending of what happens after 8th page (part 1): 
Human-kun notices a of glasses on the table. He tries to pick them up, but the moment he touches them, he feels a wave of energy run through his body and a second later a man in armor, with a long glowing light blue sword, a few smaller swords of the same color on his belt, a grayish, purple cape and short hair of the same color as the cape in the middle and white hair on the sides of his head appears in front of him. "W-who are you?" says Human-kun. The man looks at him and says "Servant, saber. My true name is Sigurd, and you are my master. Please, give me your orders". "I'm your master?" says human-kun, not understanding what Sigurd is saying. "Yes, I've been summoned by your call, the command seals are proof of it" Human-kun notices 3 red tattoo like marks on his hand. Sigurd looks at the screen. "That's your beloved one, right?" he points at Mimiko.
I would have prefered that the main girl was an actual cow instead, it would have made me hornier

The art was well made, but it feels incomplete. I get that it was short, but either give me more on cow/human relationship, give them more lines to make them more likable, or get nastier with the vore. The vore felt stiff, like... yeah, why not... chew a leg, get some breast... cowgirl aproves...
I figure it was crueler in the artist's mind. The twist would have been even better if the characters had developed more.
Also, the drawings lacked emotion. Feels as if the artist drew each panel separate with instructions and no plot
